parameters.name: featureIndex
parameters.description: The index of the feature if featuresCol is a vector column, no effect otherwise (>= 0)

parameters.name: isotonic
parameters.description: whether the output sequence should be isotonic/increasing (true) or antitonic/decreasing (false)

parameters.name: weightCol
parameters.description: weight column name. If this is not set or empty, we treat all instance weights as 1.0
